alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:59AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Van Buren, southeastern Allegan, western Barry and Kalamazoo Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1157 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Otsego to 7 miles northwest of Dowagiac. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Portage... Hastings... Allegan... Paw Paw... Otsego... Plainwell... Middleville... Vicksburg... Hartford... Galesburg... Mattawan... Lawton... Bangor... Decatur... Schoolcraft... Climax... Richland... Freeport... Martin... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
